summary: This document outlines the Terms of Reference for the Regional Reputational Risk Committee of Deutsche Bank Americas, detailing its mission, responsibilities, and governance structure. It emphasizes the Committee's role in overseeing reputational risk management and ensuring compliance with Deutsche Bank's values.
keyFacts: The Committee was established on January 1, 2010.
The document revises the terms of reference for the Committee.
The Committee is tasked with overseeing reputational risk management in the Americas region.
The Chairperson has the authority to set up the structure and membership of the Committee.
The document is marked as confidential.
